content: angel booties heel turn row 1 sl 1 p 8 p2tog p1 turn row 2 sl 1 k 5 ssk k1 turn row 3 sl 1 p 6 p2tog p1 turn row 4 sl 1 k 7 ssk k1 turn gusset setup round with heel needle pick up 6 stitches along the side of the gusset and one in the corner at the edge of the instep with instep needle knit across instep in k2 p2 ribbing with a free needle pick up one stitch in the corner of the instep and 6 stitches along the heel flap knit 5 heel stitches onto this needle soft as a cloud these sweet little socks can be round 1 knit to last 3 stitches on the first knit in a single afternoon needle k2tog k1 knit in pattern across second needle on third needle k1 ssk knit to end size 6-12 months round 2 knit across needle 1 knit in pattern materials size #5 double pointed needles 1 across needle 2 knit across needle 3 skein lorna s angel angora yarn 50 yards repeat rounds one and two until there are 7 tapestry needle stitches on each of needles 1 and 3 with 14 gauge 5 5 stitches per inch in stockinette remaining on needle 2 instep stitch foot knit across needle 1 knit in pattern abbreviations across needle 2 knit across needle 3 continue k knit in this manner until foot is 1 less than desired p purl length sl slip as if to purl p2tog purl two stitches together toe ssk slip two stitches one at a time as if to knit round 1 knit to last 3 stitches on first needle then knit them together k2tog k1 k1 ssk knit to last 3 stitches of k2tog knit two stitches together second needle k2tog k1 on third needle k1 sts stitches ssk knit to end round 2 knit across all needles cuff cast on 28 stitches divide onto 3 needles with 14 on the first 7on the second and 7 on the repeat rounds 1 and 2 three times then repeat third join in the round being careful not to round 1 twice more knit two stitches from twist knit 1 inch in k2 p2 ribbing needle 1 onto needle 3 kitchener remaining stitches and weave in ends heel flap row 1 sl 1 k 13 row 2 sl 1 p 13 copyright 2007 by julia sprague stingdragon@gmail com repeat row 1 and 2 five times each repeat row 1 once more
